#include <iostream>
#include <vector>

using namespace std;

#define MAXN 2010
int n;
int tab[MAXN][MAXN];
int con[MAXN];

int main(){
  int t; cin >> t;
  for(int cass = 0; cass < t; ++cass){
    cin >> n;
    int maxim = 0;
    int index = 0;
    for(int i = 0; i < n; ++i){
      con[i] = 0;
      for(int j = 0; j < n; ++j){
	cin >> tab[i][j];
	con[i] += tab[i][j];
      }
      if(con[i] > maxim){
	maxim = con[i];
	index = i;
      }
    }
    if(n == 1) cout << "0 1\n";
    else if(maxim == n-1) cout << 1 << ' ' << index+1 << '\n';
    else cout << 2 << ' ' << index+1 << '\n';
  }
}
